edu.jhu.coe.discPCFG
Class HierarchicalLinearizer

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.coe.discPCFG.DefaultLinearizer
      edu.jhu.coe.discPCFG.HierarchicalLinearizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Linearizer, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HiearchicalAdaptiveLinearizer
public class HierarchicalLinearizer
extends DefaultLinearizer

similar to cascading linearizer but doesnt compute the grammars explicitly instead uses hierarchical rules and merges back unused splits

Author:
petrov
See Also:
